issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi Team,

currently we are working on Appcelerator Titanium SDK version 5.3.1 and we are unable to open another application from the current application via Intent on specific Android Devices (Samsung). It throws 'sendUserActionEvent() mView==null' error when we try to call the intent. Can you please help us to resolve this issue on the upcoming SDK version.
fields.summary: Unable to open another application from current application on certain devices

comments.body: Hey there, can you give us an example code, full log and device-details first? This issue is currently not valid.
